    • Method Detail

      • createMeasureReference

        public  createMeasureReference(MeasureReference measureReference)
                             throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        POST /measure-references : Create a new measureReference.
        Parameters:
        measureReference - the measureReference to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new measureReference, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the measureReference has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • updateMeasureReference

        public  updateMeasureReference(MeasureReference measureReference)
                             throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        PUT /measure-references : Updates an existing measureReference.
        Parameters:
        measureReference - the measureReference to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated measureReference, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the measureReference is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the measureReference couldnt be updated
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • getAllMeasureReferences

        public java.util.List<MeasureReference> getAllMeasureReferences()
        GET /measure-references : get all the measureReferences.
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of measureReferences in body

      • getMeasureReference

        public  getMeasureReference(java.lang.Long id)
        GET /measure-references/:id : get the "id" measureReference.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the measureReference to retrieve
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the measureReference, or with status 404 (Not Found)

      • deleteMeasureReference

        public  deleteMeasureReference(java.lang.Long id)
        DELETE /measure-references/:id : delete the "id" measureReference.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the measureReference to delete
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK)

      • getMeasureReferencesByInstanceId

        public java.util.List<MeasureReference> getMeasureReferencesByInstanceId(java.lang.Long id)
        GET /measure-references : get all the measureReferences.
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of measureReferences in body
